fields.name: Your name:
forgotPassword.errorMessage: We could not send you a link to reset your password. Please make sure, you entered the correct email and try again.
forgotPassword.linkSent: Link sent. Please check your inbox.
resetPassword.errorMessage: An error occured while trying to reset your password. Please try again.
signin.description: Welcome back to the Rogue Scholar. Enter your credentials to sign in.
signin.errorMessage: Seems like something went wrong. Please check your credentials and try again.
signin.linkSent: The magic link was sent. Please check your inbox to continue.
signup.description: Enter your information to create a new account.
signup.errorMessage: An error occured while trying to create your account. Please try again.
signup.successMessage: Your account has been created. Please check your email to confirm your account.
